column5: I'm looking at getting a new net this year for pier salmon and harbor front pike.  something that's large enough for big fish but is also telescoping and has long handle.  Any recommendations on what's the best int he market these days?

No clue, but this link might give you some help with what is available?  https://www.amazon.com/Nets-Telescoping-Accessories/s?ie=UTF8&page=1&rh=n%3A3409171%2Cp_n_feature_keywords_browse-bin%3A2776595011
